name: NBCNews
text: Lucille Bridges, the mother of civil rights activist Ruby Bridges, who walked with her daughter past crowds screaming racist slurs as she became the first Black student at her all-white New Orleans elementary school, has died at the age of 86. https://t.co/F7iuNA24Bj

text: Food Network star Alton Brown apologizes Wednesday after referencing the Holocaust while commenting on the current political climate on Twitter. https://t.co/La4gabCict

text: More than 540 students at the University of Connecticut are under quarantine as of Wednesday amid increased Covid-19 cases on and off campus, the school says. https://t.co/7dfBXRlfVS
